telayout.description: Layout type affects available styling options

ItemRepeater.description: At least 1 testimonial required. 20+ items may impact performance.

itemValidation.starRating: String value '0' to '5' (empty string = no rating for this item)
itemValidation.avatar.url: Image URL (optional, recommended for personal touch)

rating.description: Must be true to display star ratings
rating.dependency: When true, starRating field values are shown

starIcon.dependency: When 'custom', sIcon must be set with valid icon class

descByLimit.dependency: When 'limit', descLimit specifies character count before read more

contentHei.conditionalApplies: Only when telayout is 'grid', or when telayout is 'carousel' and caroByheight is 'height'
contentHei.description: Creates scrollable content area when height is set

style.description: Visual style variant - affects HTML structure and CSS classes

values.style-1: Speech bubble with arrow (when styleLayout is 'style-1')
values.style-2: Standard card with content margin control
values.style-3: Card with bottom border accent line

openTypography.description: Must be 1 to enable typography settings, 0 to disable

warnings: Never modify block_id after creation - it's the unique identifier
starRating values must be strings ('0' to '5'), not numbers (0 to 5)
Empty starRating string ('') is valid and means no rating for that item
rating: false hides ALL star ratings even if starRating values are set
Carousel layout requires Swiper.js library to be loaded and initialized
columnSpace only applies when telayout is 'grid' (ignored for carousel)
contentHei scrolling only works for grid layout or carousel with caroByheight: 'height'
arrowNormalColor must match boxBg color for seamless speech bubble (style-1)
bottomBorderColor only applies to style-3 with styleLayout: 'style-1'
style4Alignment only affects style-4 layout
cntntMargin only applies to style-2 layout
Gradient backgrounds require openBg: 1 and bgType: 'gradient'
Border requires openBorder: 1 to be visible
Shadow requires openShadow: 1 to be visible
Typography requires openTypography: 1 to apply font settings
Custom star icons (starIcon: 'custom') require icon font library loaded
Outline stars (stoutLine: true) may not render in IE11 and older browsers
Read more functionality (descByLimit: 'limit') requires JavaScript
ItemRepeater items need unique _key values (auto-generated)
Maximum 50 testimonials recommended for performance
Avatar images should be square (1:1 ratio) for circular display
Test gradient + white text contrast for WCAG AA compliance
Responsive values cascade: md → sm → xs (missing values fall back to md)
Equal height feature (tpgbEqualHeight) may conflict with contentHei scrolling
commonMistakes: Setting starRating as number instead of string (use '5' not 5)
Forgetting to set rating: true when expecting star ratings to show
Setting openTypography: 0 then wondering why font settings don't apply
Setting openBg: 0 then setting background colors (openBg must be 1)
Using style-specific attributes without matching style value
Not testing responsive column values on actual mobile devices
Using too many testimonials (50+) causing performance issues
Forgetting to set caroByheight: 'height' for carousel content height limits
Setting cntscrollOn without setting contentHei (need height limit for scroll)
Using gradient backgrounds without testing text contrast
Setting columnSpace for carousel layout (only applies to grid)
Not providing fallback values for sm/xs breakpoints
Using non-square avatar images with circular border-radius (causes distortion)
Setting boxPadding in pixels that don't scale on mobile (test on xs)
Forgetting to set carouselId for remote carousel control
Setting both contentHei and descByLimit (may conflict - choose one approach)
Not matching arrowNormalColor to boxBg color (breaks speech bubble illusion)

recommendations: Limit to 20 testimonials per block for optimal performance
Use lazy loading for avatar images (native loading='lazy' attribute)
Avoid heavy box shadows on mobile devices
Minimize use of gradients on lower-end devices
Test carousel autoplay performance with 10+ slides
Use content height limits (contentHei) for long testimonials to prevent layout shift
Consider pagination for 50+ testimonials instead of single block
carouselSpecific: Autoplay impacts battery on mobile devices
Test touch gestures on actual mobile devices, not just emulators

requirements: Ensure color contrast meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
Star ratings should include aria-label or sr-only text ('5 out of 5 stars')
Carousel should pause on hover and focus for accessibility
Read more/less buttons should be keyboard accessible
Avatar images should have alt text with author name
Ensure focus indicators are visible on interactive elements
testing: Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
Verify keyboard navigation works for carousel and read more
Check contrast ratios with WebAIM Contrast Checker
Test with high contrast mode enabled

responsiveStrategy.cascadeBehavior: Values cascade down: md → sm → xs. If sm is not set, it uses md value. If xs is not set, it uses sm or md.

commonPatterns.3to2to1: 3 columns desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile: {md: 4, sm: 6, xs: 12}
commonPatterns.4to2to1: 4 columns desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile: {md: 3, sm: 6, xs: 12}
commonPatterns.2to1to1: 2 columns desktop, 1 tablet, 1 mobile: {md: 6, sm: 12, xs: 12}

recommendations: Always test on actual devices, not just browser resize
Reduce font sizes by 10-20% for mobile (xs breakpoint)
Increase line-height on mobile for better readability (1.6-1.8)
Reduce padding on mobile to maximize content space
Stack columns to full width on mobile (xs: 12) unless specifically needed
Test touch targets are minimum 44x44px on mobile
Reduce star size on mobile to prevent wrapping
